Articles.Content:
Okay, when I went to import a KSP dae. file into blender I got this error.

Sax FWL Error: texture with sid map\_\_23-image not found in effect with id liquid engine text-fx

Why do I get this error?

Because it was exported from something besides Blender. You have to edit the DAE in notepad.

Open it in Notepad and then the tag called <diffuse> and its closing tag </diffuse>

Delete everything between them, resave it and try to import again (make sure to copy the DAE, don\'t edge the original)
